languages.text: "Ох, я... извини. Твои цвета недавно вдруг потускнели, и теперь мне почти не больно на них смотреть. Это... из-за Лорд-капитана, верно? Хм. Молчание — тоже ответ".
"Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."
languages.original_text: "Ох, я... извини. Твои цвета недавно вдруг потускнели, и теперь мне почти не больно на них смотреть. Это... из-за Лорд-капитана, верно? Хм. Молчание — тоже ответ".

languages.text: “噢，对……对不起。你的颜色突然变得暗淡下来，我有些不忍心直视了。是……是因为舰长大人，对吗？嗯，沉默也是一种回答。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."

traits.locale_text: “噢，对……对不起。你的颜色突然变得暗淡下来，我有些不忍心直视了。是……是因为舰长大人，对吗？嗯，沉默也是一种回答。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, je suis... désolée. Vos couleurs se sont comme estompées d'un seul coup, et maintenant, ça me fait presque mal de les regarder. Serait-ce à cause... {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Hmm. Votre silence est éloquent. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, je suis... désolée. Vos couleurs se sont comme estompées d'un seul coup, et maintenant, ça me fait presque mal de les regarder. Serait-ce à cause... {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Hmm. Votre silence est éloquent. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, lo... siento. Tus colores se han apagado de repente, y ahora casi duele verlos. Es... por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ¿verdad? Mmm. El silencio también constituye una respuesta».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, lo... siento. Tus colores se han apagado de repente, y ahora casi duele verlos. Es... por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ¿verdad? Mmm. El silencio también constituye una respuesta».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁ、ごめんな…さい。あなたの色が急に薄くなってしまって、今は見ているのが苦痛なくらいです。ロード・キャプテンのせいですね？あー、沈黙もまた返事です」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、ごめんな…さい。あなたの色が急に薄くなってしまって、今は見ているのが苦痛なくらいです。ロード・キャプテンのせいですね？あー、沈黙もまた返事です」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, es ... tut mir leid. Eure Farben sind plötzlich verblasst, und nun schmerzt es fast, sie anzusehen. Es ist ... wegen des Lord Captains, nicht wahr? Hmm. Schweigen ist auch eine Antwort."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."

languages.original_text: "Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."

languages.text: "Ah... Çok üzgünüm. Renklerin öyle bir soluvermiş ki... Baktıkça canım yanıyor. Şey... Lord Kaptan yüzünden oldu, değil mi? Hımm. Susmak da bir cevap."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I am... sorry. Your colours have suddenly faded, and now it almost hurts me to look at them. It is... because of the Lord Captain, isn't it? Hmm. Silence is also an answer."
